description:
Job Title: Logistics Manager

Job Location: Boca Raton, FL

Salary: $90k-$100k

Requirements: 8+ Years Experience with a background in logistics or supply chain management with experience overseeing large scale operations

This is a full time/permanent position with a 300-person commercial restoration and construction company. Our team is composed of industry experts who are dedicated to ensuring our clients' operations are minimally disrupted, their facilities are fully restored, and their projects are completed on time and within budget.

We leverage cutting-edge technology and industry best practices to offer comprehensive solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of each client.

Due to consistent growth, they are currently hiring for a Logistics Manager to lead our expansive nationwide operations, which include a fleet of vehicles, warehouses, and equipment. This key role demands an in-depth knowledge of logistics technology, regulatory compliance, and the ability to establish and manage a network of service providers.

Top Reasons to Work with Us

  • Competitive Salary ($90k-$110k)
  • Health Benefits
  • PTO and paid holidays
  • Company Vehicle
  • Well established and stable company
  • Opportunities for growth and long-term employment

What You Will Be Doing

  • Fleet Management: Oversee the entire lifecycle of our fleet, including acquisition, maintenance, repairs, and disposal. Develop and implement preventive maintenance programs to ensure compliance with DOT regulations.
  • Warehouse Operations: Manage day-to-day operations of 20 warehouses, ensuring efficient inventory management, order fulfillment, and timely deliveries.
  • Equipment Management: Implement asset tracking systems, monitor equipment utilization, and coordinate repairs and maintenance to minimize downtime.
  • Technology Implementation: Utilize cutting-edge technology solutions to streamline logistics processes, improve visibility, and enhance data-driven decision-making.
  • Regulatory Compliance: Ensure strict adherence to all DOT regulations and other relevant transportation and logistics laws.
  • Service Provider Network: Build and maintain strong relationships with a network of reliable service providers for vehicle repairs, equipment maintenance, and other logistics services.
  • Cost Optimization: Continuously identify opportunities to reduce costs and improve efficiency across all logistics operations.

What You Need for this Position

  • 8+ years of progressive experience in logistics management, with a proven track record in overseeing large-scale operations.
  • Technology Skills: Strong proficiency in logistics software, transportation management systems (TMS), and other technology applications.
  • Regulatory Knowledge: In-depth understanding of DOT regulations and other relevant transportation and logistics laws.
  • Bachelors degree in Logistics, supply chain management, Operations, etc. is preferred

Additional Qualifications

  • 5S Certification (a plus)
  • Minimum of 2 years in warehouse experience
  • Excellent communication, interpersonal, and budgeting skills
  • Proficiency in MS Office Suite and fleet management/facility maintenance software (a plus)

Benefits

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Email Your Resume In Word To

danny.herries@cybercoders.com

  • Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : DH1-1811430 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***

Danny Herries - Lead Recruiter

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CyberCoders is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, genetic information, registered domestic partner status, marital status, status as a crime victim, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. CyberCoders will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. CyberCoders is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with physical and mental disabilities. If you need special assistance or an accommodation while seeking employment, please contact a member of our Human Resources team to make arrangements.
